p: Lipopolysaccharides (LPS) from Escherichia coli (055:B5), piracetam, and radio immunoprecipitation assay (RIPA) lysis buffer were purchased from Solarbio (Beijing, China). LPS was dissolved in 0.9% saline solution, and all the other drugs were dissolved in distilled water. TNF-α, IL-1β, and IL-6 enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) kits were purchased from Boster (Wuhan, China).
